Sentencas: For the first time, an iron doped lanthanum strontium chromite with A-site deficiency (A-LSCFe) was fabricated and utilized as an effective bi-functional catalyst for the growth of multi-wall carbon nanotubes (MWCNTs) and solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A-site deficient chromite perovskite with in situ exsolution of nano-Fe: a promising bi-functional catalyst bridging the growth of CNTs and SOFCs

Sentencas: The introduction of A-site deficiency significantly facilitates the in situ exsolution of nano-iron particles on which considerable amounts of MWCNTs are grown.
Titulo: A-site deficient chromite perovskite with in situ exsolution of nano-Fe: a promising bi-functional catalyst bridging the growth of CNTs and SOFCs

Sentencas: The material was also used as the anode catalyst for SOFCs and proved to be a very effective anode catalyst in comparison with the stoichiometric material (sto-LSCFe).
Titulo: A-site deficient chromite perovskite with in situ exsolution of nano-Fe: a promising bi-functional catalyst bridging the growth of CNTs and SOFCs

Sentencas: The exsolved nano-iron particles on A-LSCFe provide many more active sites for the oxidation reaction of fuel, leading to sharp enhancement of the electrochemical performance of the cell.
Titulo: A-site deficient chromite perovskite with in situ exsolution of nano-Fe: a promising bi-functional catalyst bridging the growth of CNTs and SOFCs

Sentencas: It is also discovered that the growth of MWCNTs with high electron conductivity leads to a further improvement of the electricity output.
Titulo: A-site deficient chromite perovskite with in situ exsolution of nano-Fe: a promising bi-functional catalyst bridging the growth of CNTs and SOFCs
